title: How do I buy a Reuters Print?
text:
All requests for the a print for personal use can be taken by our printing partner Media Storehouse. This service is managed by Reuters, but fulfilled by Media Storehouse. You can visit our galleries here: http://reuters.mediastorehouse.com or make a special request for an image through the Photo Request page here http://reuters.mediastorehouse.com/r2/dmcs_requests.html

To process your order, they require all the details of your print request (a description or the caption of the picture you require, or a web link to the picture, the photographer, date of publication and your personal details)
